about_the_game:
Welcome to Home Renovator, the ultimate interior design simulation game from the team behind Hotel Renovator. Step into the shoes of a young interior designer eager to make their mark in the industry. Dive into a world of creativity and renovation as you tackle various missions, each presenting a new challenge and a chance to showcase your skills.

Start small, dream big

Work your way through an array of houses, each with its own unique style and set of renovation needs. From cozy cottages to modern homes, every project offers endless possibilities for customization. Tear down walls, install new windows, change doors, and let your imagination run wild as you transform spaces to reflect your clients’ visions.

Lifechanging transformations

But it's not just about design; it's about understanding your clients’ desires. You'll work with a variety of people, from the quirky art enthusiast to the meticulous perfectionist, and you will need to tailor your designs to meet their expectations. As you successfully complete missions, unlock new tools, techniques, and resources to expand your creative arsenal.

Boundless gameplay

Immerse yourself in the immersive and relaxing atmosphere of Home Renovator. With thousands of items at your disposal, the only limit is your imagination. Whether you're a seasoned designer or just starting out, Home Renovator offers an accessible and enjoyable experience for players of all skill levels.

Are you ready to embark on your journey to become the ultimate interior design sensation? Take the first steps in Home Renovator and pave your way to owning your very own dream home. Let your passion for design shine and create spaces that inspire and delight!
